AppPush.Title: [EN] Collapse Launcher Update Issue
AppPush.Message: Due to bug in the launcher code, Launcher's update system might be bugged for some users. If you're still on 1.82.2 or below, please reinstall your launcher using link provided below! You won't lose your settings/game data. For more questions, please hit us up in GitHub discussion or issues.

RegionPush.Title: [EN] Notice About Game Repair Post-Plugin Update
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Trailblazers!
You may have noticed the game needed an update recently, this is normal as HoYo has pushed an update to their logging mechanism.
Due to errors in the Repair Mechanism, this changes might get reversed. For the time being, please do not use the 'Repair Game' feature until the next launcher/game update. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
